node.long_desc: 1 bull bar 1 removable skid plate;Mounting hardware Installation instructions;Limited lifetime warranty;Removable skid plate with aggressive cutout;Pre-drilled auxiliary light mounting holes;Easy, no-drill application;Truly rust-resistant 304 stainless steel construction;3 inch diameter, heavy-wall tube design;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Have you ever been strapped to the front of a truck that is flying down a dirt road in a downpour of torrential rains, with rocks flying at your face, mud whipping into your teeth and the wind caressing your polished stainless steel skin like the whisper of an angel? Well, the ARIES 3 inch bull bar has, and it's awesome. It features true stainless steel construction and a removable skid plate that fears neither death nor mother nature.

node.display_name: Aries Offroad Big Horn Bull Bars
node.long_desc: Made to complement ARIES Big Step side bars;1 bull bar 1 removable skid plate;Mounting hardware Installation instructions;Five-year warranty;Pre-drilled auxiliary light mounting holes;Easy, no-drill application;Removable skid plate with aggressive cutout;Bold, 4 inch diameter, heavy-wall tube design;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The ARIES Big Horn bull bar has been called a big, fat slob by more slender, less considerate bull bars. Although, when these other bull bars say inchbig inch, they are only commenting on the impressive 4 inch diameter and strong, lightweight aluminum construction of the Big Horn. When they say inchfat inch, they can only mean inchp.h.a.t. inch (that is, inchpretty hot and tempting inch), referring to the Big Horn's highly textured powder coat finish and aggressive skid plate design. And when they say inchslob inch, who knows? Maybe they are jealous that the ARIES Big Horn bull bar has been known to spend over half its life out on the trails, covered in mud. Thank you for the compliment, other bull bars.

node.display_name: Aries Offroad Big Step 4 in. Nerf Bar
node.long_desc: Sold in pairs with installation hardware included;Heavy-duty carbon steel mounting brackets;1 driver-side side bar 1 passenger-side side bar Mounting hardware Installation instructions;Five-year warranty;Shows well on lifted and larger trucks;Easy, no-drill application;Made to complement ARIES Big Horn bull bars;Brushed stainless steel ARIES insignia;Custom, raised, non-skid step pads;4 inch diameter, heavy-wall tube design;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: When it comes to your pickup truck, Jeep or SUV, if it's inchgo big or go home, inch ARIES Big Step 4 inch round side bars hit the nail on the head. For a solid truck, you need solid truck accessories that can stand up to the rough and tumble of the off-road trail and still look good sitting in your driveway. ARIES 4 inch round side bars are made to be bigger, bolder and stronger. We design them to be a heavier-duty side bar option that installs easily, provides reliable footing for making that climb and perfectly complements lifted and full-size trucks. We offer our Big Steps in two finishes, including textured black aluminum and polished stainless steel, because when it comes to your truck, we think size should matter.

node.long_desc: Pro-Series; Bull Bar; 3 in.; w/Stainless Skid Plate; Black Texture Finish;;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Whatever your off-roading sport of choice ? mudding, rock crawling, dune bashing, green laning, horse surfing (only legal way, way out in the boonies) ? the ARIES Pro Series bull bar is a remarkably faithful teammate. It is a inchteam player inch as they say, offering the full might of its carbon steel construction and powder coat finish to advance toward the goal and get that W. With its lean, mean stainless steel skid plate, it defends against rocks, brush, road debris and any other incoming attack to the front end of your truck. Whichever enemy territory you and your truck choose to conquer next, the ARIES Pro Series 3 inch bull bar bravely leads the pack and is proud to look back and say to you, inchCaptain, my captain. inch

node.display_name: Aries Offroad Pro Series Grille Guards
node.long_desc: High-strength carbon steel construction;Hardwearing textured powder coat finish;Open headlight brush guards;Highly customizable compared to other grille guards;1 grille guard Mounting hardware Installation Instructions;Three-year warranty;Protective rubber stripping along the risers;No-drill, four-point mounting system;Custom-fitted for vehicle-specific applications;Aerodynamic crossbar houses a single-row LED light bar;One-piece, 1 1/2 inch diameter, heavy-wall tube design;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The Pro Series design allow the Jeep Grill Guard to hold a majority of today inchs slimmer LED light bars from within. It is unlike the typical bolt on designs which mount outside to auxiliary holes and being exposed. The Pro Series center flange houses the LED light bar on its articulating channel bracket allowing the light to shift up/down, left/right and forward and back. This unique system allows the user to hold anywhere from a 20 inch down to the smallest 6 inch LED light bars and all at the precise and needed angle. Also it acts as a theft deterrent as it encloses the LED within a 12 gauge steel structure, yet provides a hi gloss mesh front for the LED light to shine through. However, if you want to change the look of the front, Aries offers additional face plates in brushed stainless and black carbon: open face plate. The Aries Pro Series is made from 1/4 inch plate and 1-1/2 inch OD cold rolled carbon steel and comes in a durable texture black powder coat finish. It is a solid once piece bolt on design, and does not require cutting or drilling. Whether you want to house your LED light bar, or you simply want the best grill guard on the market, the Aries Pro Series Grill Guard has you covered.

node.long_desc: GT and D-shapped;Perforated leather hand grip;Combination of sportiness and elegance;Ergonomic design;Grant Installation Kit is necessary to mount steering wheel;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The Corsa Collection is the Italian design inspired by the world famous European road races. Corsa is the Italian word for race and the Corsa wheels will make every driver feel like a race car driver. The Corsa Collection Wheels feature two types of beautiful hand-stitched leather crafted into a new combination of sportiness and elegance. This D-Shaped wheel has perforated leather in the hand grip driving position for maximum comfort. The grained leather top and bottom rim adds a contrasting elegance. The highly ergonomic design features make this wheel a pleasure to hold in any driving position. A Grant Installation Kit is necessary to mount this wheel to a vehicle. This wheel will work with Grant Standard 3000 or 4000 Series, Billet 5000 Series, or Euro 6000 Series Installation Kits.

node.display_name: ARIES 6 Inch Oval Side Step Bars
node.long_desc: Truly rust-resistant 304 stainless steel construction;Sold in pairs with installation hardware included;Mirror-like polished stainless steel finish;1 driver-side side bar 1 passenger-side side bar (Mounting brackets NOT included);High-strength carbon steel mounting brackets;Limited lifetime warranty;Easy, no-drill application;OE-style contours with hard ABS plastic end caps;Extra-wide, non-skid step pads;6 inch diameter, heavy-wall tube design;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: If you live to get behind the wheel of that 4x4, fire up that V8 engine and give your truck a fresh paint job of mud-brown, then you need side bars that waste none of their time twiddling their thumbs and whistling silly barbershop tunes. ARIES 6 inch oval side bars have an extra-wide step pad, an easy mounting system and a polished stainless steel finish.

node.display_name: ARIES 4 Inch Oval Nerf Step Bars
node.long_desc: Wheel-to-wheel 4 inch ovals also available;OE-style bends with blended end caps;Sold in pairs with installation hardware included;Heavy-duty carbon steel mounting brackets;Commercial-grade powder coat finish;High-strength carbon steel construction;1 driver-side side bar 1 passenger-side side bar Mounting hardware Installation nstructions;Three-year warranty;Brushed stainless steel ARIES insignia;Easy, no-drill application;Custom, raised, non-skid step pads;4 inch elliptical, heavy-wall tube design;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: You wanna talk about the ugly side of life? Every morning ARIES 4 inch oval side bars wake up with a muddy boot to the face, the occasional kick to the blended end cap, and then it's run, run, run all day long. Their usual day-to-day includes intermittent peltings with small rocks, openhanded slaps from forest shrubberies and full-body baths in mud, manure or worse. Their only rest comes after a long day of work when they are locked in the garage, alone for the night, only to do it all over again the next day. Sound like a nightmare? ARIES 4 inch oval side bars wouldn't have life any other way.

node.long_desc: 1 grille guard Mounting hardware Installation Instructions;Three-year warranty;Pre-drilled auxiliary light mounting holes;Protective rubber stripping along the risers;Removable headlight cages;No-drill, four-point mounting system;Custom-fitted for vehicle-specific applications;One-piece, 1 1/2 inch diameter, heavy-wall tube design;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Some grille guards think it's cool to abuse their trucks. They think it makes them tough to slap around a defenseless vehicle, to make innocent trucks and SUVs feel out of place and ill-fitting instead of complementing the natural beauty of their frame. In truth, a real grille guard cares for its truck, tends to its needs and makes it feel special in all the right ways. A real grille guard defends its truck from renegade road debris and the misguided insults of naysayers. The ARIES grille guard is a real grille guard. It features a four-bolt, vehicle-specific mounting system, meaning it contours to your truck's face and uses pre-existing holes for an easy installation and a sweet embrace.

node.sales_desc: ThThe bed mount tire system includes the lower bar that mounts to the bed of the truck by utilizing the existing bed bolts. Included with this lower mount there are the provisions to mount up to 4 Roto-Pax cans, water or fuel. There is a second bar that mounts to the bed caps just behind the cab. node.long_desc: Black;Tactical look;Hidden dual position latch system;Comes with the 1 inch x 1/8 inch web inserts;Limited straps;Sold as a pair;Made in the USA;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Our new GEN 3 TrailDoors are the best we have ever made. We significantly improved the quality. The door frames are now robotically welded with precision. The Frames bends are computer controlled through a CNC mandrel auto-feed machine. These new processes insure a consistent fitting door frame. Like the GEN II doors the hinge pins are bolt on, but now the latch plate is bolt on bracket as well. This allows us to add a horizontal adjustment feature on the latch location insuring proper alignment with the vehicle striker. Another improvement is the door webbing. The fit of the webbing is improved and we added Velcro loops to secure the ends of the webbing so there is no more flapping. We encapsulated the arm pads in nylon material improving the life of the padding. We also improved the material of the webbing itself, heavy cordura nylon panels for comfort and durability. The frames are painted in our dual process textured black powder coat.

node.long_desc: Rock Monster D.O.T. Beadlock Jeep Wheels;Wheel Size: 15 and 17 inch Diameter;Bolt pattern: 5, 6 and 8 Lug Design;Finish: Black, Silver and Argent
node.sales_desc: To increase the mobility of a wheeled vehicle operating in soft terrain such as sand, mud, or snow, it is necessary to increase the footprint of the tires. This is achieved by decreasing the tire's air pressure. This mobility is only achieved if the wheels are equipped with a tire bead locking device. Rock Monster's wheel design allows the use of internal beadlocks, keeping them street legal.

node.long_desc: Husky Liners X-Act Contour Floor Liners were designed with style and comfort in mind;Made from tough and durable patented rubberized material these floor mats perfectly match the contours of your Jeep, truck or SUV and brings together indestructible strength with a soft, comfortable cushion;The unique Sta-Put nibs on the bottom keeps the mats securely in place and stops them from sliding out of the way;The patented FormFit Edge is a raised ridge that runs along the door jam, protecting your vehicle from any kind of mess;Husky Liners X-Act Contour Floor Liners are easy to install just drop in and go for year round protection;Proudly designed and manufactured in the USA;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
Premium auto floor mats by Husky Liners are Soft and Strong, Just Like You.

The Husky Liners X-act Contour perfectly matches the contours of your truck or SUV and brings together indestructible strength with a soft, comfortable cushion. Add to that a premium look and our exclusive features and you've got liner gold. So come on, get those truck floor mats you've always wanted.

Form is our function - Our FormFit Design process perfectly forms each liner to the detailed contours of your specific ride. We use lasers and computers to precisely measure each individual make and model's floorboard to create the perfect fit.

Soft never felt so tough - With the perfect balance of softness and strength, our rubberized DuraGrip material was designed with comfort in mind.

We've got the Edge - Our patented FormFit Edge is a raised ridge that runs along the door jam, protecting your truck or SUV from all manner of mess.

Put your liner on lockdown - Whether you've got carpet or vinyl, our StayPut Cleats help keep the liner from shifting around underfoot like lesser liners.

Guaranteed...FOR LIFE - When we say it's guaranteed for life" that is exactly what we mean. No hassles, no guff. If you have a problem, we'll replace it.

Take it easy. - Unlike a rigid plastic liner, the X-Act Contour folds and molds for easy install, removal and cleaning. Just yank, dump, spray and repeat.
"

The X-act Contour floor liners offer a rich texture and soft, flexible feel while providing superior functionality and protection against mud, spills and mess.Protection with a flexible comfortable soft feel prevents stains & soiling of your carpeted areas. Increases your vehicle's resale value.Form-fit Edge patented design gives your floor liner a finished look while keeping damaging spills off your doorsill and carpet.Tough & Durable patented rubberized material is resistant to most chemicals and minimizes cargo shifting.Custom Fit designed using the latest in laser scanning technology to fit the complex surfaces of your specific vehicle's floorboard.Available for Front and Back Seat, in Black only.

node.sales_desc: There will be mud,snow,slush,sand,muck,and worse.But that's okay because Husky Liners let you do what you do without worrying about the messy consequences. Husky Liners brand WeatherBeater Floor Liners offer superior carpet protection against mud, spills and mess with a fresh appealing design complimenting today's current model trucks and SUV's interior styling.Protection prevents stains & soiling of your carpeted areas. Increases your vehicle's resale value.Form-fit Edge patented design gives your floor liner a finished look while keeping damaging spills off your doorsill and carpet.Custom Fit designed using the latest in laser scanning technology to fit the complex surfaces of your specific vehicle's floorboard.Patented molded in Nibs on the back of the Floor Liner help prevent annoying shifting of the liners.Tough & Durable patented rubberized material is resistant to most chemicals and minimizes cargo shifting.Available for Front Seat, 2nd Seat, and 3rd Seat in Black, Grey or Tan.Designed and Manufactured in the USA.

Husky Liners WeatherBeater Floor Liners were designed to be an all weather, rugged and sporty car mat;Made from tough and durable patented rubberized material these floor mats perfectly match the contours of your Jeep, truck or SUV and brings together indestructible strength with a soft, comfortable cushion;The unique Sta-Put nibs on the bottom keeps the mats securely in place and stops them from sliding out of the way;The patented FormFit Edge is a raised ridge that runs along the door jam, protecting your vehicle from any kind of mess;WeatherBeater Floor Liners are easy to install just drop in and go for year round protection;Proudly designed and manufactured in the USA;Available for: front, rear , 3rd row, over-the-hump and cargo areas. Offering color options in: black, gray and tan;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Put Nature firmly in its place! The rugged and sporty Husky Liners WeatherBeater Floor Liners perfectly conform to the contours of your ride and offer un-beatable carpet protection for whatever nature hurls at you. Form is our function - Our FormFit Design process perfectly forms each liner to the detailed contours of your specific ride. We use lasers and computers to precisely measure each individual make and model's floorboard to create the perfect fit. Soft never felt so tough - With the perfect balance of softness and strength, our rubberized DuraGrip material was designed with comfort in mind. We've got the Edge - Our patented FormFit Edge is a raised ridge that runs along the door jam, protecting your truck or SUV from all manner of mess. Put your liner on lockdown - Whether you've got carpet or vinyl, our StayPut Cleats help keep the liner from shifting around underfoot like lesser liners. Guaranteed...FOR LIFE - When we say it's guaranteed for life" that is exactly what we mean. No hassles, no guff. If you have a problem, we'll replace it. Take it easy. - Unlike a rigid plastic liner, the X-Act Contour folds and molds for easy install, removal and cleaning. Just yank, dump, spray and repeat."

An extra thick driver's heel pad provides years of life while the high perimeter ridges contain spills and debris. raised ridges keep your feet out of water, mud, and dirt. Our material is guaranteed not to crack or break even in the most extreme conditions. Heavy Duty Mats are easily cleaned and feature Sta-Put Nibs on the reverse side to help keep the mat in place.Designed and Manufactured in the USA and come with a Lifetime Guarantee against cracking.Available in Black (1), Gray (2) and Tan (3).

node.sales_desc:
Soft never felt so tough - With the perfect balance of softness and strength, our rubberized DuraGrip material was designed with comfort in mind. Punch it, slap it, flick it, kick it.

Put your mat on lockdown - Whether you've got carpet or vinyl, our StayPut Cleats help keep the mat from shifting around underfoot like lesser mats.

Get into the thick of it - Our Drivers Heel Pad is made extra thick for added protection from your lead foot.

Contain yourself - The perimeter edge is raised to help keep all manner of mess contained, right where you want it.

Out of the muck - Our raised ridges help to keep your feet out of the mud, water, and dirt you just tracked in.

Easy now - The Heavy Duty Floor mats are easy to install, remove, and clean. Just yank, dump, spray and repeat.

Guaranteed...FOR LIFE - When we say it's guaranteed for life" that is exactly what we mean. No hassles, no guff. If you have a problem, we'll replace it.

Designed and Manufactured in the USA - We pledge allegiance to the Flag of the United States of America, and to the Republic for which it stands, one Nation under God, indivisible, with Liberty and Justice for all. Need we say more?"

node.sales_desc: Max Energy Tuning extracts every bit of energy possible out of every molecule of fuel giving you more miles at part-throttle and more power at wide-open throttle. In order to increase engine efficiency, horsepower and torque, our engineers first optimize the spark and fuel curves point by point over the entire rpm band. With the additional power and optimized transmission functions, drivers use less fuel to accelerate and maintain cruising speeds without the torque converter un-locking and transmission down-shifting to a lower gear. The results are maximum power and fuel mileage.

node.sales_desc:
The Pro Comp A/T Sport can take you wherever you want to go. When you are trying to navigate to a killer kayak spot, seeking to make tracks on a fresh powder day, or just want to get away from civilization, Pro Comp A/T Sport is the tire to get you to your next adventure. The A/T Sport is capable in any terrain while maintaining quiet on-road manners and backed with a 60-day trial and 60,000 mile warranty. All-Terrain compound formulated for the optimum performance across wet, dry, on- and off-road surfaces. Sweeping groove technology increases traction and stability in all road conditions. Multi-pitch variation quiet ride assurance alternating tread blocks reduce pitch noise as the noise from one block pitch is canceled out by another. Side holder lugs greatly improve traction in all-terrain environments and all-weather conditions while increasing puncture resistance. Staggered design increases grip in all-terrain and inclement weather environments by clawing the driven surface.

Your off-roading adventures are only as good as the equipment on your vehicle, especially when it comes to your tires. These are the parts that give you control over slick rocky roads and rough uphill terrain. You need the very best tires available for your vehicle when your drive takes you off-road and into rugged territory. This is why 4wheelparts.com provides the best tires for Jeeps and trucks at value prices. You wouldn't settle for anything less than superior handling, so neither do we.

Where Are You Driving?

All-terrain pro comp a/t sport tires handle smoothly whether you're heading into the mountains or spending a day at the beach. The deep treads and draft angles protect your tires from punctures while unique tread designs deliver smooth handling for precision turns on just about any surface. Traction is the name of the game whether you're on a snowy road to drop the ki"

node.sales_desc: The all-new Rigid Industries' Radiance is the perfect solution for those who want Rigid's legendary quality at a level everyone can attain. The Radiance is built with the same high-grade aluminum alloy housing as our legendary E-Series, but that's where the visual similarities end. Inside, the Rigid Industries' Radiance is feature-packed, with a black exposed printed circuit board, optimized forward projecting Broad Spot optics which combine the attributes of a spot and flood beam pattern, and back-lighting available in white, amber, red, blue and green. Large back-lit Rigid branding plates further add to the unique look of the Radiance. The Rigid Industries' Radiance is for the customer who wants a truly custom look that only Rigid can provide. Available in 10 50" lengths, the Rigid Industries Radiance is the perfect entry into Rigid Industries' performance LED lighting."

node.long_desc: Trail Runner Classic Steel Wheels from Rugged Ridge were designed as an upgrade from ordinary steel wheels;Five retro-style kidney shaped holes;Durable gloss black finish;These wheels are tough enough to withstand trail duty;True to definition, hub-centric construction ensures the wheel is precisely centered on the axle, minimizing stress on wheel studs, and eliminating the added road vibration common with non-hub-centric designs;All Rugged Ridge wheels are engineered, tested and certified to meet and exceed the strenuous SAE J2530 standards for wheel strength and durability;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The Trail Runner Classic puts a new spin on a vintage look with a new gunmetal finish that is anything but ordinary. Each 2-piece steel wheel features a retro-inspired slotted face that looks as great cruising the boulevard as it does climbing over boulders. With its precision-engineered hub centric design, the 17 x 9 Trail Runner maintains a factory level fitment for dependable, vibration-free performance. All Rugged Ridge wheels are meticulously engineered, tested and certified to meet and exceed the strenuous SAE J2530 standards for wheel strength and durability. Includes a molded ABS stylized center cap for a rugged off-road look.

node.display_name: Smittybilt XRC Black Box Winch Cradle and Storage Systems
node.long_desc: Mounts into any 2 inch receiver hitch; Anti-wabble system keeps the black box stable;Features three separate, keyed-alike, lockable storage compartments;Center compartment designed to mount up to a 12,000 lb. winch;Comes with a pair of solid D-ring mounts and a pair of driving/flood lights;Pre-drilled fairlead mouting holes;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Smittybilt's XRC Black Box Winch Mount is much more than your typical winch cradle. This innovative winch mounting solution has several features you won't find on any other winch mounting platform. It has three, keyed-alike, lockable storage compartments, one for your winch (mounting holes are pre-drilled to handle up to a 12,000 pound winch) and two for all your trail gear. You can securely store your tow straps, snatch blocks, choker chains, tree savers, air compressor or any thing else, freeing up valuable storage space inside your rig. The XRC Black Box also features two heavy-duty D-Ring mounts that will provide a secure rigging point and pre-drilled fairlead mounting holes. On top of all that, the XRC Black Box includes frenched in light openings that house the included clear driving and amber fog light kit, which includes all wiring and an illuminated rocker switch. Just slide the XRC Black Box into your rig's front or rear 2 inch reciever and you will be able to get the job done.

node.long_desc: Smittybilt XRC Armor Corner Guards are manufactured from 3/16 inch cold roll steel and hand crafted to insure a perfect fit every time;Powder coated in Smittybilt's two-stage process for a durable matte black finish that will last year after year;The cutting edge design of the Smittybilt XRC Corner Guards are available with or without a 3 inch flare and and can be used with Smittybilt's Armor Rocker Guards, as well as their XRC Armor Tube Fenders;These corner guards are completely bolt on with the included stainless steel rust resistant hardware;Smittybilt XRC Armor Corner Guards are stylish, durable and built to last;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
The new line of XRC Corner Guards were specifically engineered to provide the maximum protection and clearance needed when you're pushing your rig through the toughest conditions.

The XRC Armor Corner Guards are manufactured from 3/16 inch cold roll steel, and are hand crafted to insure a perfect fit every time. Each of Smittybilt XRC Armor Corner Guards are powder coated in Smittybilt's signature series two-stage finish for a lightly textured matte black finish that will last for year after year. Although there is some drilling required, each XRC Armor Corner Guard is designed to be a complete bolt-on with stainless steel fasteners. Each corner guard is available with or without a 3 inch flare and can be used with Smittybilt's XRC Armor Rocker Guards, as well as their XRC Armor Tube Fenders

node.long_desc: 304 Marine grade stainless steel button head hardware included;Two stage textured matte black powder coat finish;Smittybilt's Advantage Limited Lifetime Warranty;Available for 2 and 4 door XJ Cherokee;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The ultimate in body side protection, Smittybilt's Body Cladding is manufactured from 1/8 inch cold rolled steel and is engineered to fit and follow body contour to exacting specifications. The body cladding will work with O.E. and aftermarket flares to give lower quarter panel protection. 304 Marine grade stainless steel button head hardware included. Two stage textured matte black powder coat finish comes with a 5 Year Limited Finish Warranty. Body Cladding comes with Smittybilt's Advantage Limited Lifetime Warranty.

node.display_name: Smittybilt XRC GEN2 Comp Series Winches
node.long_desc: Smittybilt Powerful amphibious 6.6 HP Electric Winch motor - the highest torque in the industry for Jeep Winches;Steel or synthetic rope geared for fast line speed;Multiple mounting options on the control pack;Revolutionary 3-stage Planetary Gear system for ultimate strength and quiet operation;Larger clutch for easy control during gloved operations;UV-resistant matte black textured finish;Inductive braking system reduces heat for long lasting performance;Oversized tie rod struts for maximum strength;Heavy-duty wired magnetic remote control;Magnetic remote attaches to winch, vehicle or accessories;Larger clutch lever for ease of use with gloves;Competition aluminum fairlead;Rope sleeve to protect your synthetic rope;Extended Warranty for greater peace of mind;International Standard waterproof rating;More power allows higher ratio/faster line speed;Correctly designed cable saves weight;Faster line speeds mean less time winching and more time wheeling!;37% more horsepower = more pulling power;Less weight means less drag on the front end;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
The newest generation of Smittybilt X2O and XRC winches have been enhanced in almost every area for increased enhanced performance and durability. The new 6.6HP amphibious motor is connected to a 3-stage planetary gear system with revised gear ratios for increased pulling power and lightning fast line speed. The completely waterproof, state-of-the-art 500AMP solenoid has the versatility to be mounted in multiple locations depending on your application needs. Every winch is finished in a rugged UV resistant matte black coating with stainless steel hardware, oversized aluminum cross bars, a four way roller fairlead and a forged hook. You can count on Smittybilt winches to be there every time, in every situation.
Ranging from 9,500lb 17,500 lb, the workhorse XRC series is a complete recovery system with the muscle and reliability to bail you out of any situation. Every XRC system includes a heavy-duty magnetic remote control. The redesigned solenoid box can mounted in three locations on the winch for maximum versatility. The XRC COMP Series comes complete with all the features and benefits of the original XRC series, except equipped with a stronger synthetic rope and a competition aluminum fairlead. All Gen2 XRC Winches come backed by a Lifetime Mechanical Warranty and a 5-Year Electrical Warranty.
The COMP Series difference
If you're after a winch equipped with a state-of-the-art synthetic rope, look to the XRC COMP Series for the ultimate in pulling power. Triple Mounting Options for the XRC Control Pack Smittybilt understands winches are used for a large variety of applications and has introduced the industry's first Triple Mounting Solution for the control pack. You now have the option of moving the control pack to allow increased airflow to the radiator or gain easier access to the control plug.

node.sales_desc: The 2.5 Gallon Air Tank includes: Push In fittings (male and female), Quick connect studs, 90 deg. elbows, Drain cock, Nylon hose, Pressure gauge and all necessary hardware.

node.display_name: Poison Spyder Tire Carrier Delete Plates
node.long_desc: Poison Spyder Customs Tire Carrier Delete Plates fit perfectly over the raised vent area in the center of the tailgate;Textured black powder coat for durability;Easily installs using the stock tire carrier mounting bolts. ;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The Poison Spyder Tire Carrier Delete Plates for TJ/LJ and YJ perfectly fits the lower panel between your Jeep's tailgate and bumper, to complete the Poison Spyder body armor on your Jeep. CNC-laser cut from high strength but lightweight aluminum plate, the Tire Carrier Delete Plate features the instantly recognizable Poison Spyder logo, marking your Jeep as one that is always ready and willing for some hardcore action! The Tire Carrier Delete Plate comes as bare aluminum, for you to paint, powder coat, polish or leave raw. Easily installs with supplied black truss-head pop-rivets. The Poison Spyder Tire Carrier Delete Plate is designed to fit Jeep YJ, TJ and LJ, but can also be used on CJ's with some trimming to clearance the tailgate hinges. The Tire Carrier Delete Plate fits with Poison Spyder Crusher Corners, or with any manufacturer's rear corner protection armor that ends at the vertical body seam between the quarter panel and the tailgate. The Tire Carrier Delete Plate is available in bare aluminum or with textured black powder coat.

node.long_desc: Poison Spyder Customs Front Stingers are the original hard core rock crawling Jeep bumper.;The Poison Spyder Stinger is simple, lightweight, functional and very affordable.;Poison Spyder Stingers do NOT include winch mounting provisions, but they will work with any manufacture's winch mount plate;This product ships as bare steelit will need to be painted or powder coated prior to final installation.;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
Poison Spyder Customs Front Stingers are not the same look-alike rectangular Jeep bumper. The stinger is a sturdy and functional bumper built for today's extreme trails. Stingers assist in minimizing damage during a rollover by helping to protect hood line, radiator, and engine. Additionally preventing potential end-overs when heading down steep terrain. The Stinger also protects the grill and winch with no loss in approach angle typical of bulky square bumpers.

Poison Spyder Front Stingers come in two types: Trail and Competition. Both types are built on a base plate laser cut from 3/16 inch plate steel, with a Stinger hoop made of CNC-bent 1-3/4 inch X .120 wall DOM structural tubing. The Trail Stinger's main hoop stands 27 inch from its base at a 47 angle. The Competition Stinger's main hoop stands 36 inch from its base at a 45 angle.

Stingers do NOT include winch mounting provisions. Stingers will work with any manufacture's winch mount plate. OE tow hooks will work in conjunction with Poison Spyder's Trail Stinger; If a stronger recovery point is desired check out Poison Spyder's D-Ring Shackle Tabs. Relocation of any bumper-mounted auxiliary lights is required. Poison Spyder offers a Fairlead Light Mount to relocate auxiliary lights to the top of the roller or hawse winch fairlead.

Trail and Comp Stingers are designed to bolt directly onto an OE frame using OE mounting hardware. Comp stingers may be reinforced with horizontal support tubes as shown in the photo at left, however these are not included in the kit. Stingers are shipped bare steel.

node.long_desc: Anodized black finish;1.5 inch thick;Hub centric;Made from 6061 billet aluminum;Sold as a pair;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: A wider stance gives your Jeep increased stability in off-camber situations, and more strategic tire placement for spanning notches and traversing difficult obstacles on the trail. In addition, spacing the tire and wheel further outboard may result in a tighter turning radius with larger tires, which may be limited by contacting suspension links and body panels when fully turned. Wheel spacers may also open up a wider variety of aftermarket wheels for use on your Jeep, as many wheels now come with very deep back spacing, which places the tire close to the vehicle.

node.long_desc: Black;Specifically designed for trunk area in JK Wrangler;Dimensions 22 inch x 8.5 inch x 5 inch;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The Poison Spyder Gear Bag is perfect for storing those essential items every 4X4 should carry on board. Made of heavy duty materials, this Gear Bag is a great place to put tool rolls, recovery gear, emergency and survival supplies. The bag features an extra wide, pleated opening for stowing large items, a heavy duty zipper with dual zipper pulls, and heavy duty nylon strap handles that circle the bag for extra support when hand carrying the bag. Black with a rubberized Poison Spyder logo stitched to the flap. The 22 inch X 8.5 inch X 5 inch Gear Bag was designed specifically to fit into the trunk area beneath the floor at the back of the Jeep JK, but it will work great in any 4X4.

node.long_desc: Vacuum Pump Relocation Kit;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Jk Vacuum Pump Relocation Bracket 07-Pres Wrangler JK/JKU TNT Customs. Wanting to install an aftermarket bumper on the front of your 2012 and newer Jeep Wrangler JK or JK Unlimited but not sure what to do with the vacuum pump thats located behind the factory bumper? TNT has the solution for you with our Vacuum Pump Relocator kit.Our kit provides everything you need to relocate the vacuum pump up into the engine compartment providing plenty of room for your new bumper.

node.long_desc: TnT Customs Guardian Rock Sliders offers full Jeep rocker panel protection;3/16 inch durable steel construction;Smooth surface to slide over rocks;Jeeps with a 1 inch body lift will require additonal hardware;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Guardian Rock Sliders with Full Height Rocker Covers are built with extreme off road conditions in mind. High clearance, robust construction, maximum crush resistance and supreme rocker/door protection are just a few of the key features that come with the Guardian Sliders. The innovative 1 piece Tall rocker cover option is an industry first and gives Jeepers maximum tub armor for those tight off camber rock trails. The rocker cover's aluminum construction distributes impacts extremely well, while the steel slider tube keeps rocks and trees those few extra inches away from your doors and body panels. For the ultimate in JK rocker protection look no further than our Guardian Rock Sliders. As always, built in the USA!"

node.long_desc: Adjustable Weight Distribution Shanks;Bolt-Together Replacement;California Residents: WARNING"
TnT Customs Wrangler rear bumper;Best departure angle of any JK bumper;10 mounting bolts per side on this Jeep rear bumper;D-ring mounts;Made in USA;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: TNT Customs Jeep JK Guardian Rear Bumper is designed for the true hardcore wheeler who values strength and functional simplicity. Our bumper has the industry best departure angle, ground clearance, and tire clearance-bar none. With the supplied templates, you will remove over 2 inch off the rear of your Jeep's frame.Frame modifications are easily accomplished with the hand held grinder and/or sawzall. The rear angled fascia adds to the superior departure angle and slides over obstacles with ease. Guardian rear bumpers are CNC cut and formed from premium 3/26 inch laser cut steel for an exact fit. Please note: bumper installation requires removal of rear frame cross member and factory receiver hitch. Welding is required.

node.long_desc: Black powder coat or bare aluminum;3/16 inch aluminum skin;3/16 inch steel winch tray;2-piece design;Made in the USA;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: T&T Customs Aluminum Midwidth Front Bumper for the Jeep is the perfect balance between not enough and too much. Our Midwidth Aluminum winch bumper stays out of the way on the trail and allows you to get the tires to the obstacle. With the great approach angles designed into the bumper and optional skid plate, you can tackle the toughest terrain. Our midwidth front bumper is a 2-piece design. First we start with a winch tray constructed of 3/16 inch formed steel plate for ultimate strength without excessive weight penalties. Nothing else is needed to mount your winch; drop in, bolt on and go! Accommodates most common winches up to 9500 lbs, including the massive Warn Powerplant HP. Winch tray also includes a pair of d-ring shackle mounts. Next we have our lightweight aluminum outer skin which is constructed of 3/16 inch 5052 Aluminum and includes two light mount tabs above the fairlead mount. Our optional winch guard tube is constructed of 2 inch Aluminum and comes tig welded to the bumper when ordered. Reversible fairlead mount, allows center or offset placement of your winch and fairlead. Accepts roller or hawse fairlead. Offset position must be used for WARN Power Plant HP. 3/4 inch clevis mounts are fully welded to the winch tray mount.

node.long_desc: Constructed of aluminum, expertly tig welded.;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: TNT's Jeep Wrangler YJ, TJ or LJ Unlimited rear license plate mount makes the perfect addition to any rig not running a rear license plate mounts.

node.display_name: TnT Customs Full Height Body Armor
node.long_desc: TnT Customs Full Height Body Armor was built with extreme off road conditions in mind;One-piece 3/16 inch 6061-T6 aluminum;Covers all the way from the hood line for complete protection;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Full Height Body Armor is the armor portion only, no sliders are included. Body Armor is made from one-piece 3/16 aluminum and runs all the way to the hood line for complete tub protection. The armor covers sheet metal from flare to flare."

node.display_name: TnT Customs Full Width Front Bumpers
node.long_desc: 3/16 inch aluminum skin;3/16 inch steel winch tray;Reuses factory fog lights;2-piece design;Made in the USA;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: T&T Customs newly re-designed Full Width front bumper for Jeep JK and JK Unlimited still retains much of the same styling as the previous design but with a few added features. The bumper is now available in Aluminum and features a new 2-piece design that includes a steel winch try and shackle mounts with an aluminum outer skin to cut down on weight. Steel winch tray weighs 40 pounds while the Aluminum skin weighs only 26 pounds. The Winch guard tube and fender guard tubes are optional pieces allowing you to order a bumper that fits the look you want. Includes a removable skid plate that is fully dimpled and gusseted keeping excess weight off the front of the Jeep. Our skid plate wraps under the factory air dam support to protect the sway bar disconnect motor.

node.long_desc: Best approach angle;Mounting bolts on top and bottom;Formed from 3/16 inch steel plate;Includes two integrated welded tow points;1-3/4 inch X .125 inch Guardian tube is fully welded to bumper;Manufactured in the USA;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: TNT Guardian Front Winch Bumper for Jeep Wrangler is designed and built for hard-core wheelers who appreciate clean lines and a purpose built product. Our Guardian bumper has the best approach angle and ground clearance on the market.

node.sales_desc:
This 4-piece accessory kit has everything you need to be prepared on the trails.

This first aid storage bag consists of several individual pouches to store your first aid essentials. Attaches to the rollbars in 3 locations.

The flashlight holder has durable-padded holders that attach to your 2-3 Sports Bars with heavy-duty hook and loop straps. Great products for every off-roader.

This handy 2.5 pound fire extinguisher holder will keep your extinguisher stored safely and securely to your off-road rig's 2-3 inch roll bar and off of the floorboard during dicey off-road driving conditions.

These nifty sport bar handles feature durable padded handles that can be mounted to almost any sport bar. Constructed of heavy-duty foam padded nylon webbing with a hook and loop attaching system, they are the ultimate in comfort and easy installation. Sold as a pair."

node.long_desc: Purchase a pair of neoprene front seat covers and receive the matching neoprene rear seat covers for free;Kit includes front and rear covers;100% neoprene;Center section is padded and pleated for comfort;Slip on installation - no tools required
node.sales_desc: Custom fit Smittybilt Neoprene Seat Covers provide an extra layer of protection and style for those looking to either refurnish old, worn seats or help keep new ones in pristine condition all at an affordable price. Previously sold individually, these neoprene seat covers are now available as a complete set. Each cover is 100% neoprene not just front panels like other brands and provide a custom fit for all Jeep Wranglers, including the seat design revamped in 2013. Front seats come in pairs and the matching rear cover features a center section that is padded and pleated for comfort. They are easy to install with no tools required.

node.long_desc: Double articulated tube fenders provides extra outer tire clearance for larger tires under full suspension articulation;6 inches wide and providing an extra 3 inches of suspension travel, keeps your center of gravity lower;CNC bent 1.5 inch tube covered with 1/8 inch laser cut cold rolled sheet metal;XRC Flux Fender Flares require minimal modification to your Jeep for installation;Bolts to factory mounting points and preserves the factory inner fender;Spacers and brackets provided to tie fenders to sub frame for extra strength;3/4 inch L.E.D. turn signal lights are included with the XRC Flux Front Fenders;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
Smittybilt XRC Fender Flares for the Wrangler JK have a 100% steel construction for extra durability and feature a black power coated finish for immediate use or can be painted to match vehicle color. The stream line design to helps to increase suspension articulation all while maintaining a street-able look. Less is more when it comes to XRC Fender Flares, where the OE fender does not meet your needs.

Smittybilt's XRC Flux Fender Flares are designed to perfectly contour to the factory body lines and includes the necessary mounting hardware. The XRC Flux Fender Flares are powdercoated in a two-stage textured matte black finish and feature Smittybilt's limited lifetime warranty.

node.long_desc: Two stage matte Black finish powder coat finish;Degree approach angles and raised corners;Manufactured from 3/16 inch solid plate;5-year limited warranty;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The XRC Bumpers have high degree approach angles and raised corners to maximize ground clearance. Manufactured from 3/16 inch cold rolled steel and then robotically welded to the exact specifications. Welds are ground down and smoothed out, then a two stage textured matte black powder coat is applied for the ultimate look. The front stinger is 1.75 tubing and has two light tabs that can hold up to two 9 lights. It's unique design is capable of mounting up to a 10,000 lb. winch with the option of running an aluminum or roller fairlead. Each bumper is developed to be a complete bolt on and requires no modifications to the vehicle. The rear bumper is manufactured out of 3/16 inch cold rolled steel and comes standard with a built in class III receiver hitch and two solid d-ring mounts that are welded on the inside and out for maximum strength. The tire carrier features a billet handle with a camlock system, adjustable tire mount and safety catch that will hold the swing away open while parked or positioned at any angle.

Smittybilt's Nerf Steps are a one-piece unit that bolts right onto your vehicle's frame without having to pre-assemble brackets, which means a quick and easy installation.

node.long_desc: Heavy canvas construction;Oversized zippers;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Rugged Ridge has the answer for your onboard storage needs. These soft-side storage bags feature heavy canvas construction and oversized zippers. Great for carrying recovery gear, spare parts, camping gear, clothes, or any other necessity for a wheeling trip. Rugged nylon straps keep the bags in place during even the most insane wheeling. Make the most out of your roll cage with a full complement of Rugged Ridge storage bags. These bags are easy to install and take off and work with both hard tops and soft tops.

node.display_name: Rugged Ridge Sports Bar Trail Bag
node.long_desc: Heavy canvas construction;Oversized zippers;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Rugged Ridge has the answer for your onboard storage needs. These soft-side storage bags feature heavy canvas construction and oversized zippers. Rugged nylon straps keep the bags in place during even the most insane wheeling. Make the most out of your roll cage with a full complement of Rugged Ridge storage bags.

node.long_desc: Constructed of durable automotive grade vinyl;Seat frame and brackets bolt to floor with minimal drilling;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Want all the strength and comfort of our reclining seat but without the recliner? Look no further! The Standard Replacement Seat from Rugged Ridge offers all the great quality benefits of our reclining seat but we have removed the reclining mechanism. This low cost alternative gives you the value and quality you are looking for but is priced less.

node.display_name: Jeep Oil Cooler Power Steering Pressure Tube
node.long_desc: Factory style replacement part;4.7L engines;California Residents: WARNING"
Works with your Jeep's factory frame components;Dual spring arms;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: This Spring Assist assembly was engineered to allow just one person to raise and lower the top. Designed to work with your Jeep?s factory frame components, this assembly kit is easily installed and seamlessly integrates into your soft top. Each Rugged Ridge kit features dual spring arms and a quick release locking mechanism that keeps the soft top safely locked in the lowered position for open-air driving.

node.display_name: Rugged Ridge Spare Tire Carrier Linkage
node.long_desc: Mates tire carrier to tailgate for smooth opening;Designed for RRC carrier but works with other brands as well;No drilling into the Jeeps body;Minor drilling into the tire carrier;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Has opening your rear tailgate become a burden since you added a swing out tire carrier? Has it become easier to crawl over the rear seat, to grab your gear, than hassling with the tire carrier? The Rugged Ridge Tire Carrier Linkage Kit eliminates the issue and makes accessing the cargo area quick and painless. Once installed, the linkage mates the tire carrier to the tailgate, so both open in a single fluid movement. The Tire Carrier Linkage is designed to work with Rugged Ridge XHD, RRC and Rock Crawling rear bumpers and tire carriers, but will also work with most other aftermarket bumper mount tire carriers. No drilling is required to mount the linkage to the tailgate, but some minor drilling is required to mount the linkage to the bumper mounted tire carrier.

node.display_name: Rugged Ridge Bed Mount Spare Tire Carrier
node.long_desc: Satin black powder coat finish;Pre-runner style spare tire carrier;Haul up to a 40-inch wheel & tire combo;Built from muscular 45mm diameter, 2.5mm-wall steel tubing;5mm thick CNC cut & brake-formed steel plate;Integrated wheel mount is adjustable to accommodate a variety of wheel offsets;Installs in factory mounting locations for maximum strength & rigidity;No drilling required;Limited 5-year warranty
node.sales_desc:
The Rugged Ridge Bed Mount Spare Tire Carrier answers that nagging question on the lips of proud Gladiator owners everywhere- what to do with that over-sized spare? While the factory spare is discretely tucked away under the JT's bed, outfitting your rig with 35 or larger tires will have you discovering the Gladiators departure angles to be comparable to an overloaded school bus. Bigger tires do get you over the big rocks, but your low-dangling spare will put an end to your fun in no time at all. Not to mention that lying flat on your back in the muck to access the spare for trail-side tire repair will have you questioning your position on the evolutionary chart. That's why mounting your oversize spare, conveniently & securely, in the truck bed can be a tremendous advantage for off-roaders and overlanders alike.

You'll find this pre-runner"-style Tire Carrier is not just striking in appearance, but engineered to deliver the goods with a hefty load capacity, handily hauling up to a 40-inch wheel & tire combo. Built from muscular 45mm diameter, 2.5mm-wall steel tubing and 5mm thick CNC cut & brake-formed steel plate, this carrier is rock-solid and designed to survive in harsh off-road conditions. The integrated wheel mount is adjustable to accommodate a variety of wheel offsets, while the carrier assembly installs to factory mounting locations for maximum strength & rigidity, with no drilling required. Rugged Ridge finished it off with a sleek satin black powder coat to protect from the elements and a limited 5-Year Warranty to protect from everything else, making the Rugged Ridge Bed Mount Tire Carrier a sensible choice for Gladiator owners."

node.long_desc: Easy installation;Pre-installed high-strength adhesive tape;No drilling;Sold as a pair;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Make your 07-10 Wrangler unique with Rugged Ridge interior accents. These injection-molded plastic accents are molded to match the factory interior pieces for an exact fit. Installation is a snap thanks to the pre-installed high-strength adhesive tape. Available in both brushed Silver (matches Rubicon OE interior pieces) and in polished chrome finishes, these new additions to the Rugged Ridge interior trim products will complete the look of your Jeep?s interior.

node.long_desc: Easily and dramatically customize the style of your Jeep for a new and aggressive off-road look;Offers factory like fit;Each grille is injection-molded and easily paintable;Can accommodate Rugged Ridges new steel mesh inserts;Features a larger opening that provides the engine compartment with better air flow and cooling;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Designed to appeal to Jeep enthusiasts looking to separate their rigs from the rest, the Rugged Ridge stylized grille features an aggressive off-road design with a factory-like fit that allows Jeep owners to easily and dramatically change the look of their vehicle. Each new injection-molded grille is easily paintable and comes ready to accommodate Rugged Ridge?s new steel mesh inserts if owners want to further customize the appearance of their Jeep. In addition to its dramatic styling, Rugged Ridge?s new grille also features a larger opening that provides the engine compartment with better air flow and cooling; especially important during low-speed off-road crawling when engine temperatures can rise.

node.long_desc: Rugged Ridge Spartacus Winches are lightweight, durable and affordable;Offers more exclusive features than any other electric winch in its price range; eatures a tough 3 stage planetary gear box delivering both power, and reliability on each and every pull;All the exterior winch body screws and bolts are corrosion resistant stainless steel and provide a long life;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The Spartacus heavy duty winch features a durable 6.6 HP Series Wound motor for long life and extra pulling power. Tough 3 stage planetary gear box with a 218:1 gear ratio delivering power and reliability Includes 90' of 7/16 inch synthetic rope and latched hook. Automatic load holding brake system (in the drum brake system). Includes an aluminum hawse fairlead! Tough stainless hardware is used on the body of the winch to eliminate rust. Each winch includes a durable 12' all weather cable remote solenoid box that can be mounted in multiple positions (over cable or over motor) and angles to accommodate most winch bumpers including the Rugged Ridge XHD Bumper System!

node.long_desc: 25 row stacked plate cooler;Withstands high fluid pressures;Reduces oil temperatures and exhibits minimal pressure loss;Includes: oil cooler, hoses, fittings, seals, o-ring, key plugs, sandwich plate and plate adapters;Lifetime warranty;California Residents: WARNING"

node.display_name: Jeep Oil Cooler Power Steering Return Tube

node.long_desc: Factory style replacement part.;4 cylinder and 4.0L 6 cylinder engine;California Residents: WARNING"

node.display_name: Retrax RetraxONE MX Retractable Tonneau Covers
node.long_desc: Retractable Tonneau Cover; One Piece Polycarbonate Construction;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The RetraxONE retractable pickup bed cover is manufactured from polycarbonate, a durable thermoplastic commonly known as LEXAN. This low-profile design incorporates a front cover that is flush with the truck bed cover, which streamlines the overall appearance and provides a firm, dependable seal to help to keep the truck bed dry. This rigid, one-piece sheet is engineered to retract without joints or hinges that can trap dust, wear out or freeze. Polycarbonate has excellent impact resistance and is unharmed by sun, moisture or temperatures from -50 to +200?F. Sealed ball-bearing rollers mounted onto the aluminum support beams allow the RetraxONE truck bed cover to retract or close effortlessly without the use of springs or any kind of mechanism no moving parts to jam, freeze or fail. The compact storage canister, approximately 11 inches squared, contains a unique spiral track system that prevents the truck bed cover from coming into contact with itself as it opens or closes. Tempered aluminum support beams embedded into the polycarbonate sheet add strength to support heavy snow loads and ensure quiet, stable travel at any speed. In fact, the rigid design of the Retrax truck bed cover improves the aerodynamics of your pickup so much that it can improve your fuel economy by as much as 10%!

node.display_name: Retrax PowertraxONE MX Retractable Tonneau Covers
node.long_desc: Retractable Tonneau Cover; One Piece Polycarbonate Construction;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: If luxury is the name of your game, you'll appreciate the PowertraxONE Retractable Pickup Bed Cover from Retrax. Utilizing a remote keyfob, this retractable pickup bed cover opens and closes at the touch of a button. Wireless operation allows it to easily open and close, and an electromagnetic brake allows it to lock in any position along the rail. The operation and installation process remains the same as the standard RetraxONE cover with one exception; the electrical components require a connection to the battery. The PowertraxONE also has an integrated cargo light on the canister that is operated by the remote keyfob, and includes an auto shutoff feature.

node.sales_desc: Synergy Jeep JK Thru Coil Front Air Bump Kit. Thru coil air bump kit compatible with most coil spring JK suspensions. Specifically machined bump can sets the collapsed bump stop location at the factory metal on metal contact point. No measuring or special lower bump stops required. All bump stop spacing done at the axle. Unlike other bump stop kits on the market, this kit includes shock tower and frame gussets to prevent coil bucket deflection or damage. Designed exclusively to use FOX-983-02-091 air bump. (2.0 inch stroke, 7-5/8 inch collapsed length).

node.display_name: Rugged Ridge Quick Release Side Mirrors
node.long_desc: Available in: Painted Black or Stainless Steel;Locking knob mounting;Pair;Easy installation and removal;Adjustable arms for increased visibility;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Love taking your doors off, but hate the hassle of swapping out your mirrors? Have mirror relocation brackets, but dislike the limited visibility they offer with doors on? The Rugged Ridge Quick Release Mirrors are the perfect solution for your Wrangler. How quick can you remove or install this pair of stylish black quick release mirrors? In a word, quick! The mirrors mount to a bolt-on bracket and are secured with a locking knob that allows for easy installation and removal. The long adjustable arms give you great visibility with your doors off or on.

node.long_desc: Has two mesh zippered corner pockets for storage;Windshield channel required;5 year limited warranty;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The Pocket Brief is a Summer Brief - only better! This new design includes some cool features like the elimination of the rear straps and the all-new addition of corner storage pockets for convenience. This revolutionary design incorporates two mesh zippered corner pockets in the corners over the driver & passenger creating much needed zip-up storage space. Exclusive features include: special two-sided mesh & nylon pocket" seals that shut with a reinforced zipper to keep small items in place; built directly into the Summer Brief to ensure a clean tight fit, that isn't really noticeable from outside."

node.display_name: Rugged Ridge Steel Tube Fender Flares
node.long_desc: Provides an incredible 7 inches of coverage protecting your Jeep from any flying road debris;Constructed from virtually indestructable thermoplastic to provide years of service and protection;UV treated to help protect your flares from the damaging rays that cause sun fading;Rugged Ridge's Oversized Fender Flares can be painted to match your Jeep or can be left in their original matte black finish;Designed as a direct fit, These flares utilize your factory mounting holes with no drilling required;Backed by Rugged Ridge's industry leading 3 year limited warranty;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
Need a little extra coverage for those over-sized tires?

The Rugged Ridge 7 inch Flare program gives you all the extra coverage you need while still offering the clean OE look. Each oversized flare is constructed of virtually indestructible UV treated thermoplastic to provide years of service. Rugged Ridge Oversized Fender Flares can be painted to match your Jeep or you can leave them in the original matte black finish for a sleek and stylish look. These flares are designed to bolt onto your vehicle for a direct fit with no drilling required. If you go off-road and need to protect your vehicle from rock chips and debris, look to Rugged Ridge 7 inch oversized Fender Flares!

node.sales_desc: Rugged Ridge offers the most complete line of replacement mirrors for Jeep vehicles found anywhere. All replacement mirrors are replicas of the factory original so you maintain that original equipment look while upgrading or replacing those worn mirrors. Each replacement mirror uses only the finest materials ensuring a long life and ease of use. This is the mirror head only.

node.long_desc: Tough nylon webbing;Black rubber grip handle;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Upgrades and replaces factory hard door handles with tough nylon webbing and an easy grip handle.

node.display_name: Rugged Ridge All Terrain Fender Flares
node.long_desc: Virtually indestructible direct replacement of your original factory flares;Textured black thermoplastic can be painted to match your Jeep; UV treated to prevent the flare from turning that unsightly gray chalky color over time;Designed to fit factory mounting holes with little or no modifications;Backed by Rugged Ridge's industry leading 5 year limited warranty;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Rugged Ridge provides the most comprehensive replacement Fender Flare program on the market today. Covering model years starting in 1955 until current, Rugged Ridge has you covered when it is time to replace or upgrade your Factory Fender Flares. Each flare is constructed of virtually indestructible, durable, UV treated thermoplastic to provide years of service. This special UV Treatment prevents the flare from turning that un-sightly gray chalky color. Each replacement flare is designed to fit into your factory mounting holes (some models may require some hole relocation) for ease of installation. *Will NOT fit Sahara models.

node.display_name: Rugged Ridge Front Fender Chop Bracket Kit
node.long_desc: Built-in bullet-style side marker and turn signal lights;Steel construction;Sold as a pair;Matte black powder coat finish;Installation hardware and instructions are included for a hassle-free install in record time;Includes fender reinstall kit and 2 sets of LED lights
node.sales_desc: Modifying JL flares for off-road is easy and the look is nothing short of heroic with the Rugged Ridge Fender Chop Bracket Kit. By removing the bulky factory fender light assembly, you'll have greater clearance for oversized tires with nothing to get between you and that next obstacle. Sturdy steel chop brackets install easily and lend support for the front of the factory fender flare, adding a fearless, aggressive new look. And since Jeeps don't live solely off-road, we've built-in bullet-style side marker and turn signal lights to ensure safe on-road operation too. Brackets come in pairs, for both Rubicon and Sahara models, and feature a matte black powder coat finish that blends seamlessly with the factory flare finish. All installation hardware and instructions are included for a hassle-free install in record time. Includes fender reinstall kit and 2 sets of LED lights.

node.long_desc: Mildew proof nylon;Abrasion resistant reinforced eyes;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Rugged Ridge premium recovery straps are a must for any off-road enthusiast, and are available in a variety of sizes to best suit your needs. Our heavy-duty straps are constructed with durable mildew proof nylon and abrasion resistant reinforced eyes. Nylon absorbs the shock of heavy pulls better than polyester, and its elastic properties help aid in a quicker recovery.

node.long_desc: Smittybilt Powerful amphibious 6.6 H.P Electric Winch motor- the highest torque in the industry for Jeep Winches; Steel or synthetic rope geared for fast line speed; Multiple mounting options on the control pack;Revolutionary 3-stage Planetary Gear system for ultimate strength and quiet operation;Larger clutch for easy control during gloved operations;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
The newest generation of Smittybilt X2O and XRC winches have been enhanced in almost every area for increased enhanced performance and durability. The new 6.6HP amphibious motor is connected to a 3-stage planetary gear system with revised gear ratios for increased pulling power and lightning fast line speed. The completely waterproof, state-of-the-art 500AMP solenoid has the versatility to be mounted in multiple locations depending on your application needs. Every winch is finished in a rugged UV resistant matte black coating with stainless steel hardware, oversized aluminum cross bars, a four way roller fairlead and a forged hook. You can count on Smittybilt winches to be there every time, in every situation.
Ranging from 9,500lb 17,500 lb, the workhorse XRC series is a complete recovery system with the muscle and reliability to bail you out of any situation. Every XRC system includes a heavy-duty magnetic remote control. The redesigned solenoid box can mounted in three locations on the winch for maximum versatility. All Gen2 XRC Winches come backed by a Lifetime Mechanical Warranty and a 5-Year Electrical Warranty.
Triple Mounting Options for the XRC Control Pack
Smittybilt understands winches are used for a large variety of applications and has introduced the industry's first Triple Mounting Solution for the control pack. You now have the option of moving the control pack to allow increased airflow to the radiator or gain easier access to the control plug.

node.long_desc: Smittybilt electric winch available in sizes 2k through 4k;XRC and XRC Comp series models available;A winch for every heavy-duty winching situation;The perfect recovery system for ATV & UTV applications;Muscle and dependability to bail you out of any situation;All Smittybilt Winches meet SAE-J706 standard ratings for winches.;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: These are the perfect recovery system for ATV & UTV applications, with the muscle and dependability to bail you out of any situation. These powerful winches come standard with more features and accessories than most winches in its class. Big motors, fastest line speeds and comes standard with more features and accessories than most winches in its class. It's a solid state-of-the-art machine that flat-out out hustles the competition. When you're looking for performance, state-of-the-art components and quality, look to Smittybilt for a premium product and an economical price.

node.long_desc: 1/7th the weight of steel cable;Floats - minimal weight - torque free;No kinks, curls or wire splinters to deal with;Minimal stretch - non rotational;UV & abrasive resistant;Specially coat to prevent slippage of the winch drum and rope;Comes with a protective sleeve to prevent overheating;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Smittybilt's XRC synthetic winch rope is manufactured from Dyneema SK-75 which is lighter and stronger than the traditional steel cables plus it won?t kink, curl or splinter. Each of our ropes is specially treated to be UV stable as well as heat treated. All of our ropes include a 10? protective sleeve; stainless steel thimble and safety hook with connector link which means it comes complete with nothing else to buy.

For the ultimate in off-road style and trademark Smittybilt toughness, the XRC Tube Fenders are the perfect combination of top quality design and dependability in all conditions.

Built from the finest materials and precision-engineered for optimal off road performance, XRC Tube Fenders sport a high clearance design that's practical, sleek, and sturdy, all in an easy-to-install package. Manufactured from 1.5 x .120 wall tubing and 5/32" plate."

node.long_desc: Nifty Catch-it All Floor Mats provide rugged all-weather protection with the style and performance engineered to last a lifetime;The custom molded design fits your vehicle perfectly for full coverage, factory installed look;Catch-It Floor Liners feature a raised perimeter design for added protection keeping spills from running off the liner;The aggressively nibbed underside ensures your liners stay firmly in place at all times;Nifty Catch-It Floor Mats are made in the USA and backed by a Limited Lifetime Warranty;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Designed to contain spills and stay in place Catch-it Carpet floor liners are custom molded to fit applications for trucks, CUVs, SUVs and passenger cars and offer superior protection that performs and protects under the worst conditions. LUND's proprietary floor liner design features more nibs per square inch than the competition, keeping the liners exactly where you placed them and any mess from spilling. Designed to trap rain, mud, snow, salt, chemical or anything you track into your vehicle is caught in the Catch-it Carpet floor liner's deep channels. And, the floor liners are easily cleaned with a quick rinse to look brand new. Reinforced, molded edges, designed for a precision-fit Catch-It Carpet floor liners feature reinforced, molded edges for a superb fit, resisting distortion and buckling.Catch-It Carpet floor liners offer more protection, more style, and a better fit than any other floor liner on the market.Available in black, gray and tan.

Made of a tough Vyram material that resists mud, chemicals and snow yet rinses clean with a simple garden hose. The Catch-It floor mats deliver a superior design and sporty style. Each set is a custom molded one-piece design for an exact fit for your specific vehicle. With more inchnibs inch per square inch on the back of every mat your guaranteed that the mats and the mess will not shift. The reinforced molded edges prevent distortion and waviness giving you the best fitting floor protection in the market. Deep channels and taller ridges help navigate water and debris away from shoes and pants, keeping you dry and clean. Couple that with the greatest containment volume and you have yourself the most functional mat in the industry.Available in three colors: black, gray and tan.Limited lifetime warranty.

node.sales_desc:
There's nothing better than pulling an icy, cold beverage or crisp, refreshing sandwich out of your Smittybilt Arctic Fridge/Freezer during a hot day out on the trail. The 52 quart is large enough for extended forays into the backcountry, yet still sized to easily fit in the back of most 4x4s.
The Arctic Fridge/Freezer's ultra-efficient compressor can run on 12 volt or 110 volt to provide temperatures as low as -22F in conjunction with thick 55MM polyurethane insulation. State-of-the-art LED controls are recessed to protect them from damage or accidently being altered, and the three-stage automatic power cut off to ensure that your vehicle's battery has enough reserve capacity to start the engine.

node.sales_desc: Similar to a sway bar drop kit, extended sway bar end links correct the angle of the sway bar once your vehicle has been lifted. The difference is that a drop kit lowers the mounting point on the frame to correct the angle, whereas the extended sway bar links, you simply remove the stock sway bar end links and replace them with the proper extended sway bar end link. These include Polyurethane Bushings. Features Built using 4140H steel Custom engineered yet directly replaces stock end links Maximum anti-roll and sway control Smoother handling on streets and trails Finished with a durable zinc coating to block rust, corrosion, and oxidation New polyurethane bushings Quick and easy installation Minor drilling may be required on certain models Lifetime Warranty Made in the USA

node.long_desc: *Dana 300 must be used with a passenger side front axle. Since ground clearance is a concern for most vehicles, Advance Adapters has developed a rotation kit to allow the Dana 300 to be clocked at a higher than stock rotation. The kit allows up to four different rotations than stock. The adapter is .75 inch thick and includes a new longer input shaft for the Dana 300. The kit retains the proper spline engagement and proper indexing for the Dana 300 transfer case. Kit works on all Jeep Dana 300s with a 23 spline input. Will not work with adapter kits that use a 27 or 32 spline input into a Dana 300. Floorboard and shifter modification may be required.;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: *Dana 300 must be used with a passenger side front axle. node.long_desc: Utilizes Factory Link Arm Mounts;Installation Hardware Included;Includes Replacement Coil Springs;Multiple Lift Kits for Jeeps available;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Utilizing the factory link arm mounts Fabtech offers a 5 inch Short Arm system that features heavy wall 5/16 inch thick links with rotational urethane ends for unrestricted movement. These heavy duty links feature adjustable ends to dial in caster and pinion angles. System includes front upper and lower links while the rear receives lower links only. Lift is accomplished with replacement coil springs that have a slightly higher spring rate over factory while retaining flexibility for offroad use. The front Trac Bar is relocated keeping the arc of travel uniform to the drag link angle with included dropped pitman arm. The relationship of the Trac Bar and drag link is critical in providing bump steer free driving. The rear Trac Bar is also relocated keeping the axle located under the vehicle for proper front and rear axle tracking. Fabtech offers heavy duty replacement driveshafts to be used with this system for maximum driveline reliability. Extended length bump stop brackets, sway bar links and brake line brackets finish off this excellent performing system.

node.long_desc: Shock Reservoir Mount Kit;Materials: Urethane;Two Mounts; Two Clamps;Sold As: Each;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Fabtech makes high quality suspension parts for trucks and SUV's. If your looking to take your truck into the sky, let Fabtech help you. Fabtech lift kits include high quality components that are sure to last for years to come! Established in 1989, Fabtech started as a small custom fabrication shop specializing in building suspensions for Prerunners and Race Trucks. Fabtech has since grown into a world class manufacturer of Suspension Systems and accessories for the offroad enthusiast. Fabtech operates a 200,000 ft facility in Chino, California performing all phases of R&D and Manufacturing in house. Suspension designs are created internally and hand crafted by Fabtech's team of Race Shop fabricators and engineers for proper functionality and performance. State of the art CNC Lasers, Mills, Lathes and Welders construct each component for exceptional quality control and superior strength. Unique designs, extensive testing and superior strength is why Fabtech builds the finest 2 & 4 Wheel Drive Suspension Systems on the market today.

node.long_desc: RTS System;Installation Hardware;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Fabtech?s cutting edge RTS? system has now been developed for the all new GM HD platform. The 6? RTS? utilizes a patent pending bracket system that keep the torsion bars raised up, in the stock location. This feature provides superior ground clearance at the frame as there are no torsion bars hanging down to become high centered on or damaged when offroading. The 6? RTS? system has been designed with unitized bracketry to retain the four front compression stops of the vehicle as GM intended. This distributes impact loads across a wide section of the frame rather than at a single point. High arched crossmembers and front differential skid plate are constructed of 1/4? thick steel to resist bending from hard front suspension impacts. Only 1/4? thick steel provides the rigidity and strength necessary to relocate the torsion bars, bump stops and lower control arms properly. Minimal heavy duty bracketry allow for a fast installation time with only two holes to drill and no cutting of the front diff housing. The 6? RTS? system allows the use of both 18? and 20? diameter wheels. Use 35/13.50R18 tires w/ 18x9 wheels w/ 5 3/4? BS w/ minor trimming. Use 35/13.50R20 tires w/ 20x10 wheels w/ 5 3/4? BS w/ minor trimming. Use 355/65R18 tires w/18x9 wheels w/5 3/4? BS w/minor trimming. Use 37/13.50R20 tires w/20x10 wheels w/5 3/4? BS w/minor trimming. Fits extended and crew cab models only.

node.sales_desc: This pulley is designed for high elevation clients to correct the superchargers impeller speed to offset elevation boost loss. At sea level it spools the blower faster and with more authority. Best of all as long as you have your Diablo tool up to date, it can be driven safely from sea level to high elevation without tune issue or need to switch back. You can always ask ripptuning@gmail.com before you install and they can direct you in the right direction for tune updates.
