node.long_desc: Front Lift: Crossmember & Steering Knuckles; Rear Lift: Lift Blocks with U-Bolts;Includes: Lower control arm eccentric cams, sway bar drop brackets and more;Shocks: Front & Rear Twin Tube Performance Shocks;Multiple Lift Kits for Jeeps available;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The Basic system features a front steel Coilover spacer system utilizing the factory Coilover assembly for a stock like ride. The spacers bolt to the base of the factory Coilovers and do not require disassembly to install. The 1/4 thick steel lower control arm crossmembers relocate the arms for a ride height that allows use of a 35" tall tire without issue. To further strengthen the front suspension there are cross tubes between the crossmembers with tubular frame struts to distribute front suspension impact loads. The front differential is protected with a tightly formed 1/4" thick steel skid plate. Rear suspension lift is accomplished via a block and add-a-leaf system."

node.long_desc: Your Fifth Wheel takes a lot of abuse from turbulence caused by potholes, section dividers, bridge decks and heavily worn interstate highways. The 5th Airborne premium fifth-wheel air-ride coupler acts as a buffer between the tow vehicle and the trailer, minimizing the challenges in the road. This significantly reduces the negative impact of vertical shock and longitudinal chucking. The 5th Airborne does more than improve your ride; it protects your investments by relieving stress on your coach?s frame, cabinets, mechanicals, and support mechanisms. Reduced vibration also saves your contents. Furniture, appliances, TVs, computers, dishes, glassware and other fragile items stay in their places. Drivers and passengers also benefit from reduced fatigue and the improved safety provided by the 5th Airborne?s smooth ride.;California Residents: WARNING"

node.sales_desc: A gooseneck hitch is designed for use in a pickup truck and is similar to a Fifth Wheel hitch. The difference between the two is that the gooseneck uses a ball and coupler versus a kingpin and fifth wheel hitch. Typically, the trailers that are most commonly used with a goosenecks hitches are horse and livestock trailers.

node.sales_desc: Designed for specifically for your vehicle, these Flex-A-Lite Electric Fans keep your engine cooler, allow for quicker warm-ups & cool-downs, improves water pump longevity, reduces fan noise, improves air conditioner performance, improves gas mileage and adds horsepower and torque at the wheels by eliminating the drag of a stock, belt driven fan. Flex-A-Lite offers a wide variety of electric fans to ensure the engine cooling needs of your vehicle will be met and exceeded.

node.display_name: Flex-A-Lite Electric Fan Air Conditioning Relay

node.long_desc: Dual Electric-Fan System; 15 in. Dia.; Dual Shrouded;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: This is a direct-fit, bolt-on Flex-a-lite? dual electric-fan system for '03-'07 Ford Super Duty trucks with the 6.0L diesel engine. Recover horsepower and boost your fuel economy by replacing your stock clutch fan assembly with this dual electric fan system. It features two 15-inch S-Blade electric fans. It does not include the Flex-a-lite Variable Speed Controller that varies the fan speed from 60-100 percent, depending on radiator temperature. These powerful fans move up to 6,800 cfm of airflow!

node.long_desc: Electra-Fan II; Electric Fan; 15 in. Diameter; Single Fan; Puller; Thru Core Mount;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Remanufactured Flex-a-lite? Elecrtra-Fan II is a universal fit electric fan with an injection-molded fan shroud measuring 18x16 inches. It is ideal as a primary cooling fan in many 4 and 6-cylinder applications. It includes universal mounting brackets and an adjustable thermostat controller. A fully-shrouded fan creates 45-50% higher heat transfer than a cage fan of the same performance.

node.sales_desc: The RIGID Reflect is the first LED light that not only illuminates the road ahead, but also allows you to see what's behind. The RIGID Reflect is an advanced LED lighting solution with a fully adjustable side mirror all in one. Though originally developed for UTV and Powersports applications, the Reflect is a great solution for just about any off-road application. The Reflect uses RIGID's patented LED technology and new side-shooter optics to provide a wide beam of light for cornering and drifting. For even more versatility, there are also built-in amber LEDs on the outside edge of the fixture that can be used as turn signals, flashers, or even auxiliary running lights. Roll-cage mounting clamps make installation easy, while aiming of both the light and the mirror can be adjusted independently. The RIGID Reflect is one more compact, versatile lighting solution that enables off-road enthusiasts to Own the Night.

node.long_desc: Hella LED daytime running lights set;Kit includes 2 module chains with either 5 or 6 LED modules that can be configured into the fascia of the vehicle;Each individual module contains two high-power LEDs with light distribution created by the use of an integrated optical system;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Although at first they may not seem important, daytime running lights are some of the most crucial lights on your vehicle. These lights are lit whenever your car is running and helps you be more visible to other drivers on the road which greatly reduces the chances of a daytime, head on or front corner collision since your vehicle is easier to see as it approaches from far away. Numerous studies conducted in the U.S, Canada and Europe have all conclusively shown that daytime collisions are reduced from anywhere from 7%-18% making high quality daytime running lights a must if you want to protect yourself, your vehicle and your passengers from an avoidable accident on the road.

node.sales_desc: HELLA auxiliary lamps are legendary for their ruggedness and dependability. Every one of their lamps must pass a series of endurance tests before it is branded with the HELLA" name. Unlike many "micro" sized lamps that do little more than provide accent lighting, HELLA's Micro DE lamps give you the best of both worlds--compact size and HELLA lighting performance. Micro DE lamps incorporate true projector lens optics to aim a precise beam of light exactly where you need it. They're sized to easily fit in most front grilles or air dams. This kit includes two Micro DE Xenon lamps with D2S Xenon capsules, two Generation 3 ballast units, one wiring harness with relay and mounting hardware."

node.long_desc: Available in black or green;100% 12-strand plasma single braid;Water, UV, and abrasion resistant polyurethane coating;Reduces stress;20,800 lb breaking strength;UTVs: 9,700 lb breaking strength;2-year warranty;Made in the USA;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Want to get the most performance and best recovery experience out of your winch? VooDoo Offroad Plasma winch lines are the answer! VooDoo Offroad Plasma synthetic fiber winch lines are specially formulated and altered at a molecular level for optimum strength. Since VooDoo Offroad Plasma synthetic winch lines are 86% lighter than steel cable they are easier to handle, quicker to rig and safer to use than any steel cable. They will not rust, corrode or develop skin-tearing fish hook" burrs as wire rope can. Since VooDoo Offroad Plasma synthetic winch lines develop no kinks and have no memory like steel cable they will spool more evenly and pull off the drum easier than steel making them stronger, safer, and more reliable than any steel cable on the market. VooDoo Offroad Plasma winch lines don't store energy so you will get no whiplash or recoil eliminating any opportunity for the rope snapping back. Made in the USA, VooDoo Offroad Plasma synthetic winch lines are ready for the toughest jobs both on- and off-road getting you out of the places you Don't Dare to Go!"

node.long_desc: Available in black or green;With or without rope bag;Various lengths and rope thickness available;100% 12-strand nylon single braid;Water, UV, and abrasion resistant polyurethane coating;Reduces stress;Stretches up to 38% (UTV 28%);2-year warranty;Made in the USA;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Want the best and strongest Recovery Rope in the World? VooDoo Offroad is the answer. VooDoo Offroad Kinetic Recovery Ropes give you a 16 M.P.H. head start over the competition! VooDoo Offroad Recovery Ropes utilize KINETIC ENERGY accumulated in each recovery rope as it stretches to increase the pulling force and reduce the sudden impact generated by conventional tow straps. Every inch the rope stretches results in KINETIC ENERGY which transfers into force directed towards the stuck vehicle or object your are pulling out, allowing for a smooth un-jarring extraction. When you want the best Offroad Recovery Ropes in the world, VooDoo Offroad Kinetic Recovery Ropes are the answer. For more pulling power and less impact, choose the best, VooDoo Offroad Kinetic Recovery Ropes, so you can get out and Do What You Don't Dare To Do!

node.long_desc: 10-stage variable valving;High pressure nitrogen charged;35mm piston;Chromed hardened 18mm piston rod;54mm shock body to dissipate heat faster;36kN tensile strength;Spring loaded piston rod seal;Military spec. fluid rated to 40 C;Rubber bushings for better absorption;Metallic silver paint;3-year manufacturer's warranty
node.sales_desc: Improve your on and off-road ride quality with Rough Country's premium N3 shocks! These 10-stage variable valving, high-pressure Nitrogen charged shocks offer a fantastic blend of off-road action and smooth highway ride quality. With a durable 18mm spring-loaded piston rod and faster-cooling 54mm shock body, this shock offers up to 36kN Tensile Strength for a long lifespan of impressive vibration dampening. Features natural rubber bushings and an eye-catching metallic silver paint.

Rough Country's Coil Springs offer greater deflection for a smoother, more consistent ride quality with the ability to handle more weight and load than the factory coil springs. With an increased linear rate design, this spring replacement kit provides a more controlled and predictable ride quality when compared to stock components. Each spring is designed to resist bowing and sagging to maintain a consistent vehicle height and ground clearance.

node.display_name: Rough Country Heavy Duty Ball Joint Set
node.long_desc: Chromoly ball stud ; Polyurethane dust boot ; Carburized alloy housing ; Heavy duty OE upgrade ; Greasable ; Works with all aftermarket axle shafts ; Metal on metal design;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Rough Country Jeep Wrangler ball joints are packed with features that you won't find in other inferior designs. At the heart of each Rough Country ball joint is a high-precision chromoly ball stud that is oil-quenched, tempered and has spiral grooves to ensure lubrication during intense use. These ball joints are fully greaseable and feature a metal on metal design to provide a longer life span compared to joints featuring plastic or polymer components."

node.long_desc: Replaces weak factory tie-rod and drag link;Holds up better against off-road obstacles;Durable 1.5-inch DOM tubing;Engineered with wrench flats for ease of install and adjustability
node.sales_desc:
Give your steering setup incredible durability with Rough Country's HD Steering Kit. Off-road obstacles such as rocks and logs can wreak havoc on your factory steering components. This handy steering upgrade replaces the weak factory tie-rod and drag link with a massive 1.5in DOM tube replacement that's considerably larger than stock and ready to withstand off-road torture.

Once installed, Rough Country's HD Steering Kit provides greater clearance between the tie-rod and diff cover. Your new steering setup includes rotational non-articulating joints to prevent bump steer while providing a tighter steering feel. The included tie-rod ends feature easy-access winch flats to aide in installation and make adjustments much easier!

Beef up your vehicle's steering setup and be ready to face the gauntlet of off-road obstacles before you! Includes a Lifetime Replacement Guarantee!

Go Rhino's new series of roof racks allows a whole new level of customization with removable front and rear fairings. Removing the fairing allows for the installation of front or rear facing lights. Optional side mounts for dually lights included. fairing removed, longer items like paddleboards and kayaks can be carried as well.

node.display_name: Oracle Lighting Oculus Bi-LED Projector Headlights
node.long_desc: Wattage: 36W each;Total Lumens: 4800LM;Color Temp: 5500K ;Certification: DOT SAE 5839-504 HL VOR 19;Warranty: 2 years
node.sales_desc:
Introducing the all-new Oculus Bi-LED Headlamp system by ORACLE Lighting. Featuring advanced LED projection with 4,800 Lumens of high-quality illumination for enhanced driver visibility in all weather conditions. The LED light source has lower power demands compared to the factory lamps while providing more light output.

Features:
Precision LED lighting projector for optimum light distribution and beam angle. Installs using original mounting hardware and headlight wiring is Plug & Play into the factory connector without additional relays or harnesses. Halo DRL features over 200 bright white LEDs for a vivid lighting impact.

Benefits:
These all-new headlamps provide enhanced driver visibility with increased and focused LED light output. Complete headlight replacement, better light focus than a simple bulb upgrade. Package includes tool for easy beam angle adjustability for proper light focus on lifted Jeeps.

Safety:
Light focus is very important for not only driver safety but others on the road who can potentially have their vision obstructed by glare. This is especially significant on lifted vehicles where the light source is raised and in a position to interfere with the field of vision of other drivers. These new Oculus headlights feature a very sharp cut-off line and focus light with precision specifically to avoid such issues.

Reliability:
It is undeniably important to implement proper thermal management tools for high-performance LEDs to operate with reliability in various environments. Oculus utilizes both active and passive cooling methods to sustain low LED temperatures. Remote mounted heat sinks and an internal cooling fan work in conjunction to insure proper temperature control and longevity of the LEDs.

node.display_name: Baja Designs Cowl Mount Light Kits
node.sales_desc: Whether you're planning to blast through the desert at night or just blast down the highway without worrying about hitting a deer, your factory lighting could probably use an upgrade. Even the most modern OEM lighting is barely adequate for nighttime highway driving, and completely inadequate for off-road use.Fortunately, you have lots of lighting upgrade options from the LED truck lighting experts at Baja Designs. Our vehicle-specific LED auxiliary lights and brackets give your vehicle the lumen-boost you're looking for with clean, professional-quality installation hardware and minimal drilling or vehicle modification.In addition to vehicle-specific mounting systems and hardware, Baja Designs carries a wide variety of LED light bars and pods for truck or Jeep. You can also choose between white and amber lenses, as well as spot, flood, or combo configurations.

node.long_desc: Extremely aggressive intake tone under acceleration and boost;Powder-coated black airbox keeps unwanted hot air from entering the air filter;Functions with the stock intake duct which supplies cold air to intake filter;High-flow oiled air filter provides increased filtration surface area;Easy installation can be completed in one hMishimoto's;Available with a polished, wrinkle black or wrinkle red pipe finish;Requires a tune;Designed in Delaware, USA and filter made in USA;Mishimoto Lifetime Warranty
node.sales_desc: FA20 engines love air, so why not give it to them? The Mishimoto 20142018 Forester XT intake will give your Subaru that extra amount of power that it needs. your Subaru's twin-scroll turbo will quickly draw massive amounts of air through the 3 mandrel-bent pipe and high-flow filter. A tune is required to run this intake because of the large-diameter piping, but the results are well worth it. The included black powder-coated airbox defends your air filter from the dreaded heat-soak by isolating it from the rest of the engine bay. This Forester XT intake changes the positioning of the MAF housing slightly, but don't worry, this kit includes a MAF extension harness to keep installation simple. With a Mishimoto Forester XT intake, you'll have no issues getting anywhere on time, and you'll sound good doing it."

node.long_desc: Filters solids from your Jeep's cooling system;Helps prevent clogging and extends the life of your Jeep's radiator, heater core, and other cooling system components;Installs in under 1 hour;Filter housing can be rotated to accommodate supercharger piping or other modifications;Includes Wix coolant filter to remove particles as small as 27 microns;4mm-thick steel bracket will stand up to anything the road or trail can throw at it;Includes durable ball valves for long-lasting and leak-free service;Direct-fit hoses make installation quick and easy;Mishimoto Lifetime Warranty
node.sales_desc:
The cooling system in your 2012-2018 Jeep Wrangler is one of the most crucial systems in the entire vehicle. If just one component in the cooling system fails or becomes clogged, it can be catastrophic. A clogged heater core is inconvenient on a chilly night's drive, but a clogged radiator can leave you out in the cold with a blown engine.

Unfortunately for many JK Wrangler owners, repeated clogging and replacement of cooling system components is an all too familiar scenario. Normal engine wear and servicing can introduce damaging solids into the cooling system, wreaking havoc as they go. 2012-2018 JKs are particularly susceptible, however, thanks to excess casting sand left in the cylinder heads from the factory. But Mishimoto is here to help clean up your JK's cooling system.

Their 2012-2018 Jeep Wrangler JK Coolant Filtration Kit will help keep anything that's not liquid coolant from circulating around your engine and cooling components. This direct-fit kit installs in under an hour and the included Wix filter traps particles as small as 27 microns. Their silicone hoses are a direct fit and the included ball valves make for a durable and long-lasting system. The 4mm-thick steel bracket can stand up to anything the street or trail can throw at it.

Like all Mishimoto products, the Mishimoto 2012-2018 Jeep Wrangler JK Coolant Filtration Kit is backed by Mishimoto Lifetime Warranty.

node.long_desc: Complete kit;Includes Sway Bar, End Links, Bushings, Arms;All Hardware and Mounting Brackets;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The RockJock 4x4 Antirock Sway Bar Kit provides balanced performance of front and rear suspension for rugged off-road conditions. It gives the driver increased traction by balancing and distributing the weight over all four tires. The Anitrock Off Road Sway Bar is designed to replace the stock Jeep sway bar. The Sway Bar is made of SAE 4130 Heat-treated steel for ultimate strength. This is the same quality used in professional off-road competition.

node.long_desc: Designed to be used with RockJocks Currectlync tie rod;Bracket plate;Lock washers and nuts;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: This is an oversized steering stabilizer bracket designed to be used on the RockJock Currectlync heavy duty tie rod system, but it may also be used in other universal applications that use 1 1/4in. rods. Includes the bracket plate, the two 3/8in.-24 thread u-bolts, lock washers and nuts.

node.long_desc: For RockJocks Currectlync tie rod;Left hand thread;1-1/8in. thread for added strength;Includes grease fitting;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Left hand thread drag link end for Currie's Currectlync heavy duty tie rod set is designed with 1 1/8in. thread for added strength. Grease fitting provides for increased performance and long life. Includes boot, castle nut, and cotter pin.
Threaded Jam Nuts for RockJock Threaded Bungs

Custom machined weld-in bung for use with forged Johnny Joint rod ends or any other 1in. thread rod end. Hex shaped - not round for ease of bar adjustment. Also included with this bung is a custom machined jam nut that is the same hex size as the bung.
